com.zello.sdk

Interface Events


  • public interface Events
    The Events interface provides a means to intercept key changes within the Zello SDK.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAppStateChanged()
      The onAppStateChanged() method is fired when the AppState changes.
      void onAudioStateChanged()
      The onAudioStateChanged() method is fired when the the state of the audio changes.
      void onContactsChanged()
      The onContactsChanged() method is fired when the Contacts for a user changes.
      void onLastContactsTabChanged(Tab tab)
      The onLastContactsTabChanged() method is fired when the last Contacts tab changes.
      void onMessageStateChanged()
      The onMessageStateChanged() method is fired when the state of either a MessageOut or MessageIn changes.
      void onSelectedContactChanged()
      The onSelectedContactChanged() method is fired when the selected contact for a user changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onAppStateChanged

        void onAppStateChanged()
        The onAppStateChanged() method is fired when the AppState changes. This method is invoked on the UI thread.

      • onAudioStateChanged

        void onAudioStateChanged()
        The onAudioStateChanged() method is fired when the the state of the audio changes. This method is invoked on the UI thread.

      • onContactsChanged

        void onContactsChanged()
        The onContactsChanged() method is fired when the Contacts for a user changes. This method is invoked on the UI thread.

      • onLastContactsTabChanged

        void onLastContactsTabChanged(Tab tab)
        The onLastContactsTabChanged() method is fired when the last Contacts tab changes. This method is invoked on the UI thread.
        Parameters:
        tab - The tab that changed.

      • onMessageStateChanged

        void onMessageStateChanged()
        The onMessageStateChanged() method is fired when the state of either a MessageOut or MessageIn changes. This method is invoked on the UI thread.

      • onSelectedContactChanged

        void onSelectedContactChanged()
        The onSelectedContactChanged() method is fired when the selected contact for a user changes. This method is invoked on the UI thread.
